about_the_game:
Welcome to Evershine

The third game of the My Time series. Evershine is a 3D open world Simulation RPG that takes place in a wholesome post-apocalyptic world 330 years after the Day of Calamity destroyed civilization. After surviving the nuclear winter for hundreds of years underground, people are finally picking up the piece again…

The story takes place 3 years after the events of My Time at Sandrock and My Time at Portia. The Duvos Empire has taken over the Orzu Ruins which the Principality of Ethea also claims as their own, leading to a tense situation just north of the Alliance of Free Cities border in the Northern Eufaula region. The Alliance initiated the North Development Plan to move more settlers into the region in an effort to establish a new City State for a better defensive posture. It is calling on anyone interested in new opportunities to move to the region...

Develop romantic relationships with ten core, charming NPCs, including four chosen by backers' votes, and experience heart-pounding moments in every interaction. Beyond romance, you’ll meet over twenty unique NPCs, each with their own personality, ready to be part of your settlement. As you invite them in, you’ll forge deep, lasting bonds that grow stronger over time.

Below is the special art of our core romanceable characters in pajamas, a special present to celebrate the New Year!

You’ll be playing as the Governor of the Evershine Settlement, recruited into the North Development Plan by the project’s Director, Mr. Gaudi. Your job will be to build up the infrastructure (either by prefabs or DIY), recruit the right settlers, tame the wilds, and build up your settlement into a strong presence next to the border. Along the way, you will find friendship, adventure, responsibility, and maybe even romance! We want you to leave the game feeling like you have accomplished something great, together with your people in your town.

Choose from prefab designs for quick building or construct your home piece by piece. Your followers and residents will help bring your vision to life, making each settlement unique. Whether you prefer simplicity or customization, you have the freedom to build the home of your dreams.

You can play through the story of this game with up to three other players! Together, construct the town from scratch, recruit helpful settlers, engage in battles, share romantic moments, dive into long lost dungeons, and shape the legacy of the Evershine settlement!

  • Customize your character!

  • High quality art direction

  • Unique settlers with their own stories

  • Assign up to 3 followers that can help you in battle, acquisition, or construction

  • Lots of seasonal events and mini-games

  • Even more side quests that flesh out the world

  • Climb and glide anywhere!

  • And so much more!

short_description: Be the Governor of a brand-new settlement on the fringes of the Free Cities, facing the almighty Duvos Empire. Recruit settlers, build infrastructure, tame the wilds, and lead your people to become a new cornerstone for the Alliance in this adventure-packed simulation RPG!
